elfoAPI.sale

Class SaleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • elfoAPI.sale.SaleController

  • public class SaleController
extends java.lang.Object
    Representa a classe que manipula o repositorio e gerencia a criaçao e confirmaçao de "Sale"s no geral
    Version:
    0.1.29
    Author:
    Ezequias Moises dos Santos Silva
